virtual-sensor.name: ETZ_SyslogNg__mapped

init-params.param: if ( ! isdef('positionMap')) { positionMap = [:]; } if (POSITION != null && GENERATION_TIME > System.currentTimeMillis()-2592000000) { positionMap.put(POSITION, System.currentTimeMillis()); }

virtual-sensor.description: show syslog-ng information of the CoreStations from the ETZ deployment
